title: Re:Zero The Great Spirit Puck’s Nyan Nyan Nyan Sunny Day - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Male Protagonist   Short Story
author: Nagatsuki Tappei   長月 達平
description: The Great Spirit Puck's Nyan Nyan Nyan Sunny Day (大精霊パックのにゃんにゃんにゃん日和) is a shop exclusive limited edition short story. This was later adapted and included in the Re:Zero Ootsuka Shinichirou Art Works Re:BOX.>
